root.name: Flight Unlimited III
root.description: OverviewFlight Unlimited III was the third and last entry in the series as L ooking Glass StudiosÂ was dismantled in 2000. Gameplay Features: - Robust Weather Editor (create own weather patterns, cycles, etc) - Scenery Editor known as FLED - Communication with Air Traffic Control - If Flight Unlimited II was installed, could interface the two games and fly at both locations Location: - Focused on another specific location: Seattle, Washington USA Available Flyable Aircraft: New to Flight Unlimited III - Mooney Bravo - Lake Renegade 270 Seaplane - Raytheon Beechjet 400A - Stemme S10-VT Motorglider Carried over from Flight Unlimited II - Fokker Tri-Plane (based on Fokker Dr.I) - Muskrat Seaplane (based on DeHavilland Beaver) - P-51D Mustang - Piper Arrow - Trainer 172 (based on Cessna 172) - Twin Engine Windhawk (based on Beechcraft Baron)
